  • Method Details

    • builder

      public static QueryBuilderConfig.Builder builder()
      Get a builder for a QueryBuilderConfig. The builder is pre-populated by the values set via setDefault(QueryBuilderConfig)
      Returns:
      new builder instance

    • setDefault

      public static void setDefault​(QueryBuilderConfig config)
      Sets the default config. This config will be used by all QueryBuilder and QueryFactory which do not have their own configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - config to set

    • defaultConfig

      public static AtomicReference<QueryBuilderConfig> defaultConfig()
      Gets a reference on the configuration. The underlying configuration may change at any time.
      Returns:
      config reference

    • isThrowing

      public boolean isThrowing()
      Check if the config is throwing
      Returns:
      true if throwing

    • isAtomic

      public boolean isAtomic()
      Checks if atomic transactions should be used.
      Returns:
      true if atomic

    • rowMappers

      public RowMapperRegistry rowMappers()
      Get the row mappers of the config.
      Returns:
      row mappers instance

    • exceptionHandler

      public Optional<Consumer<SQLException>> exceptionHandler()
      Exception handler for thrown exceptions
      Returns:
      error handler

    • executor

      public ExecutorService executor()
      Executor to submit the completable futures.
      Returns:
      executor
